description: a(n)=Sum{T(n,2k): k=1,2,...,[ n/2 ]}, array T as in A049777.
comments: a(n) is coefficient of x^2 in - Product(j=1..n, 1 + (-1)^j*j*x). - _Robert Israel_, Jun 08 2015
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (2,1,-4,1,2,-1).
formula: G.f.: x^2(x^2+x+2)/[(1-x)^4(1+x)^2]. Pairwise sums of A023856. - _Ralf Stephan_, May 06 2004a(n) = Sum_{k=1..n} k*floor(k/2). - _Vladeta Jovovic_, Apr 29 2006a(n) = n^3/6 + n^2/8 - n/24 - 1/16 +  (-1)^n * (n/8 + 1/16). - _Robert Israel_, Jun 08 2015
prog: (PARI) a(n)=(4*n^3 + 3*n^2 + 2*n - if(n%2,6*n+3))/24 \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Jun 08 2015
author: _Clark Kimberling_
